original_text: So Absalom lived two full years in Jerusalem, without coming into the king's presence.
korean_text: 압살롬이 이태 동안 예루살렘에 있으되 왕의 얼굴을 보지 못하였으므로

sentences.original_text: So Absalom lived two full years in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 압살롬은 예루살렘에서 꼬박 이 년을 살았는데,

sentences.original_text: without coming into the king's presence.
